item.title: [筆記] Deploy Mojito app to Heroku
item.description: First, you need to follow this doc (http://developer.yahoo.com/cocktails/mojito/docs/quickstart/) to install Mojito as a global node module. Why install it globally? Because you need the Mojito command line to create your first app. Create application with command line: mojito create app mymojito Change working directory to “mymojito”. Create a “Procfile” whose content is: web: mojito start $PORT Use the following command to create an application on heroku and deploy codes to
